com.btmatthews.selenium.junit4.runner
Annotation Type SeleniumConfiguration

@Documented
@Inherited
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface SeleniumConfiguration

SeleniumConfiguration is the base for class-level meta-data which can be used to instruct client code with regard to use a Selenium.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews
